channel.title: Meta on Joy Holowicki
channel.description: Recent content in Meta on Joy Holowicki

item.title: Welcome!
item.description:
===============================================================

Hello, glad you decided to check out my portfolio website. As you may have noticed, I had in mind material design principles when I built it and used Hugo to generate the static files -added some JS for good measure, of course.

(More below.)

===============================================================

  • This website is a work in progress and may need updating from time to time.

  • You’ll find my applications and websites page generally reflects the same content as my github in card form.

  • Navigate to the bottom of each page to find my contact info. Feel free to get in touch with me about a job or any questions/comments you have about my work.

  • Check out my “About Me” page, or download a PDF of my CV directly here.

Hope to chat with you soon. -Joy
